729713f-b.title: Richmond: Stuyvesant Place - Wall Street
729713f-b.text:
Stuyvesant Street (left to right), at iall
Street, showing, at the N. W. corner of the two
thoroughfares, the Staten lIsland Academy and, at
the N. E. corner (right), the Staten lIsland Insti-
tute of Arts and Sciences. Construction is going on
on the S. E. corner of the intersection.
August 3, 1928
P. i. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)

section.
August 3, 1928
